roleset.name: look at with mouth open
roleset.note: GAPE-V NOTES: Intransitive often, and metaphorical always, means 'be wide open'. (from gape.01-v)

example.name: gape-v: intransitive and metaphorical
example.text: Many openings for mass cheating, such as questionable tax shelters and home offices, have gaped so broadly that Congress has passed stringent laws to close them.

example.name: gape-v: transitive and literal
example.text: Mary gaped at John's sparkling-clean room.
